${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:TheLastWish.NAME: The Last Wish
${modID}:TheLastWish.FLAVOR: You've always landed on your feet... what could go wrong?
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 9 times you lose HP, you are healed for 20% of your Max HP and add a random #yDeath #yCurse to your deck.

${modID}:EldersEye.NAME: Elder's Eye
${modID}:EldersEye.FLAVOR: Memories of distant ancestors seem to be imploring you to stop being so reckless.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with 1 #y${modID}:Caution. At the start of your turn, gain 1 #y${modID}:Caution.

${modID}:AncestralCall.NAME: Ancestral Call
${modID}:AncestralCall.FLAVOR: In the heat of battle, the rush of blood in your ears sounds like music.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yStrength, gain an equal amount of #y${modID}:Lion's_Heart (Max 50 per combat).

${modID}:TotemOfLife.NAME: Totem of Life
${modID}:TotemOfLife.FLAVOR: Someone once told you pain was temporary, or was that a dream?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces
.[] Every 9 times you take damage, you are healed for 20% of your Max HP, add a random #yDeath #yCurse to your deck, and gain 1 #yIntangible.

${modID}:EndOfActBounty.NAME: Bounty
${modID}:EndOfActBounty.FLAVOR: You have travelled land and sea searching for riches, but nowhere has been as strange as The Spire.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now select a special event as a free action at Rest Sites.

${modID}:EmptyWhiskeyBottle.NAME: Empty Whiskey Bottle
${modID}:EmptyWhiskeyBottle.FLAVOR: Once full, too long empty - as it was drained, a part of you changed.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you draw each turn costs 1 less.

${modID}:OrbRegalia.NAME: Orb Regalia
${modID}:OrbRegalia.FLAVOR: Seems pointless, but if polished you can see an amusing version of yourself looking back.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have #yVulnerable, gain 2 Temporary #yStrength and #yDexterity.

${modID}:GingerbreadHouse.NAME: Gingerbread House
${modID}:GingerbreadHouse.FLAVOR: The door doesn't even open, it must have suffered from the blight.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn with [E] equal to or greater than your [E] limit, draw 2 additional cards next turn.

${modID}:MagicScreen.NAME: Magic Screen
${modID}:MagicScreen.FLAVOR: When touching the knobs, shapes appear before you, only to disappear when shaken.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you are made #yVulnerable, gain 3 #y${modID}:Unfazed.

${modID}:SkunkTail.NAME: Skunk Tail
${modID}:SkunkTail.FLAVOR: The tail from an ancient creature that lived long before the spire, it still stinks.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card with a different cost than its original cost, gain 2 #yBlock.

${modID}:BlueBowtie.NAME: Blue Bowtie
${modID}:BlueBowtie.FLAVOR: You can't resist batting it away to watch how it glints in the air.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yRest, a random #yCurse is removed from your deck.

${modID}:BlueBook.NAME: Blue Book
${modID}:BlueBook.FLAVOR: You were never much of a reader, but this book sent you on a journey.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 card in your deck, it provides [E] when played.

${modID}:OrangeBook.NAME: Orange Book
${modID}:OrangeBook.FLAVOR: You were never much of a reader, but this book sent you on a journey.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 card in your deck, it applies 2 #yVulnerable to EVERYONE when played.

${modID}:CyanBook.NAME: Cyan Book
${modID}:CyanBook.FLAVOR: You were never much of a reader, but this book sent you on a journey.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 card in your deck, it causes you gain 4 #yVulnerable and 1 #y${modID}:Unfazed when played.

${modID}:GreenBook.NAME: Green Book
${modID}:GreenBook.FLAVOR: You were never much of a reader, but this book sent you on a journey.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 card in your deck, it causes you to gain 3 #y${modID}:Caution when played.

${modID}:YellowBook.NAME: Yellow Book
${modID}:YellowBook.FLAVOR: You were never much of a reader, but this book sent you on a journey.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 1 card in your deck, it causes you gain 4 #y${modID}:Lion's_Heart when played.

${modID}:Deaths.NAME: Deaths
${modID}:Deaths.FLAVOR: As long as you don't reach nine, there's nothing to worry about.
DESCRIPTIONS: #gCurrently:
#rNext:
At the end of combat, remove 1 random curse.
Start combat with 5 #yCaution.
At the end of combat, gain 2 max HP.
Draw 1 extra card per turn.
Start combat with 3 #yMetallicize.
Start combat with 3 #yRegen.
Gain 1 [E] at the start of each turn.
At the end of combat, upgrade a random card.
At the end of combat, set max HP to 1.
Click to check effects.

${modID}:CorinthianLeatherBoots.NAME: Corinthian Leather Boots
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a #y${modID}:Reckless card, gain 3 Temporary Strength.

${modID}:OstrichFeather.NAME: Ostrich Feather
${modID}:OstrichFeather.FLAVOR: "Oh my, such a strange pigment! Perhaps whatever dropped this was able to control fire." - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, gain #yGold equal to the number of curses in your deck.

${modID}:MouldedPellets.NAME: Moulded Pellets
${modID}:MouldedPellets.FLAVOR: Eating these might not be as effective as before.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, reduce all of your Debuffs by 2 and gain 2 #y${modID}:Lion's_Heart.

${modID}:ToyMouse.NAME: Toy Mouse
${modID}:ToyMouse.FLAVOR: It can even move on its own, so distracting.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you have #yVulnerable, it increases by 2.
